author: Rick Steves' Europe
description:
Get a 30-second glimpse of Rick Steves’ newest episode — premiering fall 2025 across the US on public television, and streaming (free!) at https://www.ricksteves.com/watch-read-listen/video/tv-show

Istanbul's rich heritage spans the centuries from Christian Byzantium to Muslim Ottoman rule to today's thriving city. We start our look back at the Roman-tinged Hippodrome, then indulge in the ancient ritual of the Turkish bath. We take in the Blue Mosque and the grand Hagia Sophia, taste Turkish delight at the venerable Spice Market, and explore Topkapı Palace and its harem room deep within.

Subscribe for more travel previews and full episodes: https://www.youtube.com/user/RickSteves
#ricksteveseurope #rickstevesistanbul #istanbul
title: Istanbul: Capital of Emperors and Sultans Preview
